item.title: CSSOM Smooth Scrolling
item.description: Update: demo and documentation site: iamdustan.com/smoothscroll/ Coming soon to a browser near you Paul Irish recently shared on Google+ that the CSSWG has standardized smooth scrolling on behalf of web developers everywhere. This means no more jQuery or other such javascript to simply scroll to an element. In the future youâ€™ll be able to declare smooth scrolling in your css with body { scroll-behavior: smooth } or programmatically by using window.
